name: dlbcspjwd01-phase-2
description: Phase 2 codebase for the course module DLBCSPJWD01. Includes client and server side directory

scripts.install:all: npm install --prefix client && npm install --prefix server
scripts.dev: bash -c 'npm run dev --prefix server & npm run dev --prefix client & wait'

author: Mohammad Kaify Iqbal
